item.title: Psychophysically Tuned Divisive Normalization Approximately. Factorizes the PDF of Natural Images. V. Laparra and J. Malo.
item.description: The conventional approach in Computational Neuroscience in favor of the efficient coding hypothesis goes from image statistics to perception. It has been argued that the behavior of the early stages of biological visual processing (e.g. spatial frequency analyzers and their non-linearities) may be obtained from image samples and the efficient coding hypothesis using no psychophysical or physiological information.
